page.title: 16Shopping in Wash Common
page.content: We visited the shops in our block, a newsagents, a fish and chip shop, a wine merchant's and a supermarket called Budgen's.In 20 minutes 119 people went into these shops. We asked them five questions about shopping in Wash Common and found that most people shopped locally once or twice a week. People also go into Newbury to shop on average twice a week. To the question which shop would you like to see here, most people wanted a chemist but a boy of 15 wanted a record shop. Only two people surveyed bought everything locally. Later this year a chemist shop will be opening in Wash Common which according to our survey should please the local people. We also found that the majority of people shopped in a town away from Newbury about once a month.
